title: Her research interests range from the lexical, semantic and discourse-pragmatic aspects of intensifiers, intensifying morphology and other intensifying constructs, to lexicology, lexicography and specialized lexicography. She has published extensively on English and Italian intensifiers, intensifying and evaluative morphology, English and Italian lexical blends and other extra-grammatical word formations.
